des:
Safemo skill for Amazon Alexa is to enable Echo Show to view the camera added on the Safemo App.

1. After downloading the Safemo App, log in or register the Safemo account. 
2. Open the Alexa App to search Safemo skill for Amazon Alexa and enable it, and then the Alexa-supported camera will display on the All devices page of the Alexa App. 
After that, the user can watch the streaming of the camera through the Alexa device and talk to the person in front of the camera.

After adding a new camera or deleting a camera in Safemo App, the camera will appear or disappear on the All devices page of the Amazon Alexa App. 

If you want to view the streaming of the camera, you can say: 
"Alexa, show me the smart camera."
"Alexa, show me the camera."

If you want to pause, you can say: 
"Alexa, stop."
"Alexa, go home."

If you share the camera with others in the Safemo App, they can also use the Alexa device to watch the camera’s streaming.
